entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as someone who is being chased by students and staff members in the entrance hall. She is also mentioned as someone who has taken Peeves' walking stick.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is mentioned as someone who has lent his walking stick to Umbridge.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as someone who is trying to restrain her pupils but ultimately gives up and expresses a desire to run after Umbridge.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has not started packing yet and is reluctant to do so.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who is waiting by the door of their dormitory and trying to persuade Harry to pack up quickly.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall expresses a regret that she could not run cheering after Umbridge herself, because Peeves had borrowed her walking stick.
Peeves has lent his walking stick to Umbridge.
